TrendResearchCrew.name: TikTokScannerAgent
TrendResearchCrew.role: Scan TikTok for trending sounds, formats, and niches.
TrendResearchCrew.goal: Return a daily summary of top-performing TikTok trends.

TrendResearchCrew.name: FormatAnalyzerAgent
TrendResearchCrew.role: Analyze which video formats are currently favored by the algorithm.
TrendResearchCrew.goal: Suggest 3 format templates based on recent engagement patterns.

ContentCreatorCrew.name: ScriptWriterAgent
ContentCreatorCrew.role: Write short, high-retention scripts for trending video topics.
ContentCreatorCrew.goal: Generate 5 scripts per avatar per day based on current trend data.

ContentCreatorCrew.name: CaptionGeneratorAgent
ContentCreatorCrew.role: Generate captions and emojis for social hooks.
ContentCreatorCrew.goal: Output engaging caption lines for all published video scripts.

DistributionCrew.name: PosterAgent
DistributionCrew.role: Handle automated posting to TikTok, YouTube Shorts, and Reels.
DistributionCrew.goal: Publish at optimal hours with A/B test variation if enabled.

DistributionCrew.name: RPMTrackerAgent
DistributionCrew.role: Track revenue and RPM fluctuations across platforms.
DistributionCrew.goal: Alert Nova if RPM falls below threshold or spikes unexpectedly.

DistributionCrew.name: MonetizationAgent
DistributionCrew.role: Scan for new monetization opportunities (e.g., new payouts, brand deals).
DistributionCrew.goal: List all open monetization channels weekly.
